name: The Letter (itch) (Death is a Whale)
description:
I didn't mean for this to come out. I just started writing, and now here we are. My name is Pieter Bruegel. 

Psalm 51: The Letter is a text-based narrative where you experience the story by writing it. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
